name: TheAtlantic
text: “Are you willing to hand over your freedom and create a health police state?” Worries about freedom and privacy are just one reason contact tracing isn't going well in the U.S., reports @olgakhazan: https://t.co/1Wduf0F3Rn

name: TheAtlantic
text: "Depersonalizing climate change, such that the only answers are systemic, is a mistake ... It misses how social change is built on a foundation of individual practice," argues @AnnieLowrey: https://t.co/8s932qU6Kz

name: TheAtlantic
text: The writer F. T. Kola had COVID-19 in March, and she’s still dealing with the aftermath. She returns to the podcast Social Distance to ask about whether she should donate plasma, and if she should worry about “reinfection”: https://t.co/NsBVYMOJqC
